item.title: Captivating and Entertaining Science
item.description:
Captivating and Entertaining Science

My name is Oskari Vinko and I can help you capture attention, deliver a convincing message and give an impression that you master your topic. I have worked my way from stage fright and shyness to an internationally renown science communicator. I won world's largest science communication competition, FameLab, in 2015 and I've been invited to speak in several European countries.

item.title: FameLab International 2015 winners talk about FameLab & Science Communication
item.description:
FameLab International 2015 winners talk about FameLab & Science Communication

Our famelab winner Oskari Vinko along with runners up Lillian Smestad & Francois-Xavier Joly talk about why science communication is important.
